2143.subject: NURS
2143.course_title_long: Quality and Safety Education for Nurses: Safety and Quality Improvement
2143.descrlong: Seeks to nurture and grow the student's knowledge and attitudes toward the Quality and Safety Education for Nurses (QSEN): Safety and Quality Improvement. Promotes the development of student concept comprehension and application by sharing curriculum content between the Consortium Community College nursing programs and the CSUMB nursing program. Will be taken during dual enrollment with the student's first or in any subsequent semester in the Community College nursing program.
